title: how do i check my points?
body: Im really confused about ocean week 2017. How do i check my points? how do i contribute? why am i not getting my hextech chest and key? and last of all i dont understand the self gifting stuff Thanks Riot-SlimeDude45

replies.body:
This is the official Ocean Week 2017's website.
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/oceanweek-2017

Once you're there, log on if you haven't already, and it should be the same page where you now can track your progress. Or if you haven't Enlisted, you can do so simply by clicking the "Enlist" button that's somewhere on the page right below this line "Oceanic Homeguards, it's time to take action!" if I'm not wrong.

If you're Enlisted and logged in, the page should show various current details such as the "Battle Timer" (how much time left for a Monster), the Monster's HP bar, battle record against the Monsters, which map is currently on "bonus", and how much contribution you've made so far.

Each win in any map besides I think bots and custom mode should win you 1 point, or 2 if you are playing a given map in their respective bonus days (the details for bonus days are at the very end of the webpage).

The rewards are unlocked in a milestone fashion, with each Monster's defeat serving as milestones. The first 2 rewards are unlocked and benefited by any player regardless of whether or not they are participating, so every player should find the entire champ roster f2p and that they can Mystery Gift themselves in the storefront just fine (self Mystery Gifting should be available in the "Featured" section of the storefront, called "Double Legendary Chance Mystery Gift"). The all-champ-f2p and self-Mystery-Gift last only til the end of this event.

However since the 3rd milestone, with the sole exception of the 4th reward, every other rewards from now on are limited to those who have contributed. The 3rd reward, the Hextech Chest and Key, requires you at least have 4 points of contribution _overall_. So if you haven't Enlisted, or that you haven't earned 4 points so far, I'm afraid you've missed that.

But do not fret, as long as you complete 20 or more points of contribution by the end of the event, you can still receive 2 sets of Hextech Chest and Keys. 20 point is really easy to earn, you only need 10 wins on the whatever map that's currently in "bonus" (and much faster if the said map in bonus is ARAM or TT).

So good luck.

EDIT: info correction about the 3rd reward.

EDIT2: word swap from "mode" to "map" for higher accuracy.

Oh and here is a correction for one of the misinterpreted info from the webpage in my last post: With the 3rd reward, you didn't need to contribute 4 points during the 3rd Monster's fight to be eligible for it, you only need to have at least 4 points _overall_. So if you've got at least 4 points under your belt regardless of where they came from, then your Hextech Chest and Key is coming, it just takes a while for everyone to receive it, but should arrive within 24 hours.
Quick clarification here, it didn't have to be 4 points on that day, but it did have to be 4 points before the end of that day, so he still won't get his chest unfortunately.

Just wanted to say that this is all correct and a extremely good explanation of the event! Only thing I'd change is that it is the maps rather than the modes that matters for the bonus - i.e. all games mode on Summoners Rift (Normal, Both Ranked and Nexus Siege) and both modes on Twisted Treeline (Normal / Ranked) give bonus points on their respective days!
